io.barracks.ota.client.helper

Class PackageDownloadHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • io.barracks.ota.client.helper.PackageDownloadHelper

  • public class PackageDownloadHelper
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    A helper which makes it easier to use the PackageDownloadService.

    Use bind(Context, PackageDownloadCallback) before starting a download, and unbind(Context) when you are done using the helper.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

        android.content.BroadcastReceiver.PendingResult

      • bind

        public void bind(android.content.Context context,
                 PackageDownloadCallback callback)
        Call this method to register your callback before performing a download.
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        callback - The PackageDownloadCallback which will be called during the download.

      • unbind

        public void unbind(android.content.Context context)
        Call this method to unregister your callback and free the resources when you are done with this helper.
        Parameters:
        context - The context.

      • requestDownload

        public void requestDownload(UpdateDetails response,
                            String tmpFile,
                            String finalFile)
        This method request requests the download of a package.
        Parameters:
        response - The details received from the Barracks platform.
        tmpFile - The temporary destination of the package.
        finalFile - The final destination of the package.
